The things that make for peace delivered in a sermon preached before the right honourable the Lord Mayor, and the Court of Aldermen, at Guild-Hall-Chappel, upon the 23 of August, 1674 / by John Sharpe, D.D., now Lord Arch-bishop of York. Sharp, John, 1645-1714. Hooker, William, Sir, 1612-1697.
The second edition.
[6], 27, [3] p.
Printed for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1691.
Advertisement: p. [1]-[3] at end. Running title: A sermon preach'd before the lord mayor. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======

The second edition.

Printed for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1691.
